pullRequest.title: [CDAP-17063] Add additional functionalities to improve user experience (RequestHistoryTab)
pullRequest.bodyText:
Hovering over a request log, we can see additional icons, which allow us to

view timestamp of the log
delete request log


Search over request logs
Enable / disable save mode. When saveRequests mode is on, we save requests.
Clear all request logs

beforeCommit.message: Add additional functionalities to improve user experience (RequestHistoryTab)

nodes.bodyText: I wonder if we should leave off the reference to the CDAP account, so this message makes sense in CDF as well, i.e. "Are you sure you want to clear all your request history?"

nodes.bodyText: withStyles should already overwrite these values  for ExpansionPanelSummary. Are the !important necessary?
